> 28 minutes ago, Nazalassa said:

> Is it possible to ask that a thread will close on a certain date?

If you are the <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> of the thread, we can close a thread for you.   And if you ask nicely ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)") and don’t do it too often, yes we could set a thread to lock at a certain date or time, as long as there is a legitimate reason for the time lock.    I can’t tell you what those reasons would be, because it would be on a case by case basis.  Doing it just because you can is not good enough.    Also, if we deem the forum to be better served by keeping a thread open, we reserve the right to deny a lock request, timed or otherwise.
